newsitem.title: USA: IPO FILING - Leukosite files for 2.1 mln shrs.
newsitem.headline: IPO FILING - Leukosite files for 2.1 mln shrs.

text.p: Leukosite Inc filed Friday with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to register an initial public offering of up to 2.1 million common shares it expects to sell between $8 and $10 each.
Underwriters for the offering, Hambrecht & Quist and UBS Securities, have an over-allotment option of up to 375,000 shares.
The Cambridge, Mass., biopharmaceutical company said proceeds from the sale will be used to fund research and development and for other general corporate needs.
After the offering, the company will have 8,683,176 shares outstanding, according to the SEC filing.
For the three months ended March 31, the company reported a net loss of $2.179 million. That compares to a net loss of $2.227 million in the year-earlier period.
